channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mortgage rates jump higher, casting a chill over the housing market
item.description: Mortgage applications fell 12.7% in the past week, the Mortgage Bankers Association said.

item.title: The buying opportunity of a lifetime is coming. But not before a 40% drop for the S&P 500, says this strategist.
item.description: Thomas Kee argues that the S&P 500 is far from being fairly valued, but what will be a painful process of correcting that is finally getting under way...

item.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
item.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”

item.title: Tesla gets a slew of price target cuts after big earnings miss
item.description: After Tesla's first-quarter earnings miss, Wall Street analysts are wondering what's next for the electric vehicle giant.

item.title: Several Wall Street shops trim their Apple price targets ahead of earnings next week
item.description: Multiple banks pulled back their target prices for shares ahead of the company's quarterly financial report.

item.title: Bernstein says there's a buying opportunity in this fast casual food chain that can rally 40%
